column1: Uchi////Hands down the best sushi I've ever had!! We enjoyed the tasting menu and each time I thought a dish was my favorite
column2: the next one would come out and I was blown away. Everything was so fresh
column4: and plated beautifully. Prior to coming I read raving reviews about the fried milk dessert and ..... OMG it was even better than anticipated!! We walked out full and very very happy. Â Although pricey
column5: it was worth every single penny and I can't wait to come back.
